string-array.name: healthtip
string-array.item: Quit eating so much you fatty.
Have you been physically active today?
*psst* I think you might have put on a few pounds.
Replacing soda with water is probably a good idea.
You are what you eat, so you must be eating a lot of nuts.
Celery is a very low calorie food. You can nearly starve to death by eating nothing but celery.
